title: Didnt get the doomed minion icon
body: I played the game and still havent received the doomed minion icon, it said up to two weeks after november 3rd i should get it, should i send a support ticket once the two weeks are over completely? And in which category to send the support ticket if so? Thanks.

replies.body:
Yes, you can submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you don't receive it by the end of the day on Nov 17th. You can use the first category "I have questions about League". 

Let me know if you have any questions.
